method.name: get_joystick_movement
method.description:
Get the joystick movement as a `Vector2` from four joystick actions in the `Input Map`. You need to define *four* joystick actions, each _ending with its direction_.
For example, if you want to handle a joystick action named `move`, you need to register: - `move_left`, `move_right`, `move_up`, `move_down`
Or if your joystick action is named `aim`: - `aim_left`, `aim_right`, `aim_up`, `aim_down`
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- # If `aim_up` strength is 0.5 and `aim_left` strength is 0.5 for example var movement := SxInput.get_joystick_movement("aim") # => movement = Vector2(-0.5, 0.5) ----
